resource.pluginArgs: --inputFile @@dataDir@@/Ehmerged.tab --externalDatabaseSpec "%RESOURCE_NAME%|%RESOURCE_VERSION%" --geneExternalDatabaseSpec 'E. histolytica Genome and Annotations from jCVI|@@Ehistolytica_genome_VER@@' --developmentalStage ''

info.displayName: E. histolytica Mass Spec/Glycosylation (Carpentieri et. al.)
info.institution: Boston University Goldman School of Dental Medicine
info.description: Concanavalin A affinity chromatography on the total protein extract, the a triptic digestion and a PNGase F hidrolisys (to release N-linked glycans and identify glycosilation sites) and LCMS/MS (LTQ Orbitrap).
